enWisdom: Fear [of Allah] is the distinguishing feature of the believers

Wisdom: الْخَشْيَةُ مِنْ عَذَابِ اللَّهِ شِيمَةُ الْمُتَّقِينَ
enWisdom: Fear of the punishment of Allah is a quality of the God-wary
Verily believers are afraid [of displeasing Allah]

Wisdom: إِذَا اصْطَفَى اللَّهُ عَبْداً جَلْبَبَهُ خَشْيَتَهُ
enWisdom: When Allah chooses a servant he covers him with His awe
Fear of Allah is the consolidation of faith
